summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6021 for the improvement of Northlake Avenue from Stone Way to Aurora Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 81255, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
